_comment: Metadata field to XMP tag mapping.
This file defines which XMP tags are used for metadata fields in the archive.
Each key is a field name used in config.json languages section.
Each value is the corresponding XMP tag name that will be written to image files.
Standard fields:
- description: General description of the image/archive
- credit: Attribution/credit line (e.g., archive name)
- rights: Copyright notice
- terms: Usage terms and restrictions
- source: Physical location or source of the original item
All fields except 'creator' are written as XMP LangAlt tags with language variants.
'creator' is handled separately as XMP-dc:Creator (bag of names, not LangAlt).
To add custom fields:
1. Add a new entry here: "fieldname": "XMP-namespace:TagName"
2. Add the field to your languages in config.json
3. The field will automatically be written to images with language variants
If this file is missing, the following defaults are used:
- description: XMP-dc:Description
- credit: XMP-photoshop:Credit
- rights: XMP-dc:Rights
- terms: XMP-xmpRights:UsageTerms
- source: XMP-dc:Source
